Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:
 +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 9 (2d6 + 2)
piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).
If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an
extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.
